Player History
Had first career hit (double) on 9/7/1985, off Burt Hooton (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/8/1985, off Mike Mason (TEX)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/1986, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against New York (Y), driving in 3 runs on 9/3/1986...
Injured on 4/4/1987 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for full season...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,907,143 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,478,571 through salary arbitration...
10/10/1990: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $10,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/3/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $13,040,000 per year...
Traded from New York (Y) to Oakland on 2/4/1991 (Going to OAK: C Mickey Tettleton, P Brad Arnsberg. Going to NYY: 1B Larry Arndt)...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
